\DoxyCodeLine{02919\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ Multi-\/selection\ system}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02920\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ Documentation\ at:\ https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/wiki/Multi-\/Select}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02921\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ Refer\ to\ 'Demo-\/>Widgets-\/>Selection\ State\ \&\ Multi-\/Select'\ for\ demos\ using\ this.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02922\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ This\ system\ implements\ standard\ multi-\/selection\ idioms\ (CTRL+Mouse/Keyboard,\ SHIFT+Mouse/Keyboard,\ etc)}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02923\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ with\ support\ for\ clipper\ (skipping\ non-\/visible\ items),\ box-\/select\ and\ many\ other\ details.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02924\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ Selectable(),\ Checkbox()\ are\ supported\ but\ custom\ widgets\ may\ use\ it\ as\ well.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02925\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ TreeNode()\ is\ technically\ supported\ but...\ using\ this\ correctly\ is\ more\ complicated:\ you\ need\ some\ sort\ of\ linear/random\ access\ to\ your\ tree,}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02926\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ which\ is\ suited\ to\ advanced\ trees\ setups\ also\ implementing\ filters\ and\ clipper.\ We\ will\ work\ toward\ simplifying\ and\ demoing\ it.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02927\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ In\ the\ spirit\ of\ Dear\ ImGui\ design,\ your\ code\ owns\ actual\ selection\ data.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02928\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ This\ is\ designed\ to\ allow\ all\ kinds\ of\ selection\ storage\ you\ may\ use\ in\ your\ application\ e.g.\ set/map/hash.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02929\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ About\ ImGuiSelectionBasicStorage:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02930\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ This\ is\ an\ optional\ helper\ to\ store\ a\ selection\ state\ and\ apply\ selection\ requests.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02931\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ It\ is\ used\ by\ our\ demos\ and\ provided\ as\ a\ convenience\ to\ quickly\ implement\ multi-\/selection.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02932\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ Usage:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02933\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ Identify\ submitted\ items\ with\ SetNextItemSelectionUserData(),\ most\ likely\ using\ an\ index\ into\ your\ current\ data-\/set.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02934\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ Store\ and\ maintain\ actual\ selection\ data\ using\ persistent\ object\ identifiers.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02935\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ Usage\ flow:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02936\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ \ \ BEGIN\ -\/\ (1)\ Call\ BeginMultiSelect()\ and\ retrieve\ the\ ImGuiMultiSelectIO*\ result.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02937\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ -\/\ (2)\ Honor\ request\ list\ (SetAll/SetRange\ requests)\ by\ updating\ your\ selection\ data.\ Same\ code\ as\ Step\ 6.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02938\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ -\/\ (3)\ [If\ using\ clipper]\ You\ need\ to\ make\ sure\ RangeSrcItem\ is\ always\ submitted.\ Calculate\ its\ index\ and\ pass\ to\ clipper.IncludeItemByIndex().\ If\ storing\ indices\ in\ ImGuiSelectionUserData,\ a\ simple\ clipper.IncludeItemByIndex(ms\_io-\/>RangeSrcItem)\ call\ will\ work.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02939\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ \ \ LOOP\ \ -\/\ (4)\ Submit\ your\ items\ with\ SetNextItemSelectionUserData()\ +\ Selectable()/TreeNode()\ calls.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02940\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ \ \ END\ \ \ -\/\ (5)\ Call\ EndMultiSelect()\ and\ retrieve\ the\ ImGuiMultiSelectIO*\ result.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02941\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ -\/\ (6)\ Honor\ request\ list\ (SetAll/SetRange\ requests)\ by\ updating\ your\ selection\ data.\ Same\ code\ as\ Step\ 2.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02942\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ \ \ If\ you\ submit\ all\ items\ (no\ clipper),\ Step\ 2\ and\ 3\ are\ optional\ and\ will\ be\ handled\ by\ each\ item\ themselves.\ It\ is\ fine\ to\ always\ honor\ those\ steps.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02943\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ About\ ImGuiSelectionUserData:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02944\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ This\ can\ store\ an\ application-\/defined\ identifier\ (e.g.\ index\ or\ pointer)\ submitted\ via\ SetNextItemSelectionUserData().}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02945\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ In\ return\ we\ store\ them\ into\ RangeSrcItem/RangeFirstItem/RangeLastItem\ and\ other\ fields\ in\ ImGuiMultiSelectIO.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02946\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ -\/\ Most\ applications\ will\ store\ an\ object\ INDEX,\ hence\ the\ chosen\ name\ and\ type.\ Storing\ an\ index\ is\ natural,\ because}}
\DoxyCodeLine{02947\ \textcolor{comment}{//\ \ \ SetRange\ requests\ will\ give\ you\ two\ end-\/points\ and\ you\ will\ need\ to\ iterate/interpolate\ between\ them\ to\ update\ your\ selection.}}
